extendedInfo.description: Bundesliga Explorer is a mobile news portal where you can find your favorite German football teams, matches, league table, league schedule or live scores. You will also find a football betting odds, articles, tweets, photos or videos in seconds from a variety of trusted sources. Enjoy the fast and easy way to navigate the Bundesliga with our Explorer, completely free.We support German Bundesliga, Bundesliga 2 and Champions League in this app.NEWWe have added FREE Notifications - GOAL alerts for your favourite team (since ver.2.0)Content:>> All German Bundesliga football clubs>> Bundesliga and Bundesliga 2 league schedule - Simply add a selected event into your calendar>> Live Scores & League table - Real Live Scores refreshed every 2 minutes, including goal-scorers, yellow cards,â¦>> Notifications - Real Goal alerts for your favourite team. (Go to Settings / Notifications Goal Alerts)>> Results history - We keep track of all previous German Bundesliga results for the season 2011/12>> Odds comparison - Information about betting odds and Visual odds Power graph for all punters>> Fan Photo / Video Gallery - Share your best moments with other fans and win football jersey every month>> The most recent articles, tweets, videos>> Fast processing, simple to use and mobile friendly design- No affiliation with any 3rd party content inside this app- No hidden costs or charges- Only commercial element in this app is AD banner served from time to time by AdMob network.We look forward to hearing your feedback!Please contact us at media@sportexplorer.mobiEnjoy our app!Best Regards,developers247

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: Lots of features keeps user updated with variety of options
reviews.author: Ibrahim AlFakir
